name: Monkey Balloon Game
description:
Monkey is a big fan of archery and considering shooting all ballons down,bust those balloons for fun with cute Monkey now,take a deep breath, get real high!Each level is designed with a special shape consists of different balloons.
Note that darts do not carry over from level to level. Look out for special balloons, and have fun discovering what they all do.'Unlimited dart mode' enabled after level 25.
Classic shooting game.Blow up balloons Now!

HOW TO PLAY
1. Tap the screen to aim your throw.
2. Hold to choose the power of your throw.
3. Release to shoot.
3. Try to pop as many balloons as possible using the darts you are given each level.

Enjoy all 50 levels of balloons shooting Game!
